Name: Shark Dating Simulator XL+
About the game: As a unique detective who operates mostly underwater, can you solve the array of baffling cases brought to you by eccentric clients? And even if you can, can you score with a shark girl along the way? The answer is; yeah, probably. Shark Dating Simulator XL is a quirky visual novel packed with irreverent and immature humour featuring short-play stories with a host of remarkable characters. Well, it will be. It's got one story right now, but I'm aiming for another one ready for November and finally we can leave early access! ~ A visual novel unlike any other. ~ Vibrant cartoon graphics. I have two degrees in this stuff, believe it or not. ~ Kawaii Shark Girl desu Senpai!
